name: 7 Wonders
description: A card game where you pick and pass around a hand of 7 cards. Gather different combos of cards and build your world wonder to get the most points within 3 ages! Quick and easy with a large group.

name: A War of Whispers
description: An area control game where you and your opponents are controlling the same kingdoms from the shadows, trying to influence certain ones to be dominant. But you don't know who likes which kingdom, it could be the same or different ones. The trick is to figure out which kingdom is favoured by who before it's too late!

name: Andromeda's Edge
description: A large scale game where you are exploring and colonizing the edge of the galaxy. You will be building, battling, buying, and besting your opponents with technology, ships and resources!

name: Army Chess
description: The chinese Stratego. You are trying to capture the flag deep in the enemy's camp. The pieces will have their individual ranks and will beat everything below them. Use your powerful units to clear away your opponent's pieces. Be careful of the mines and bombs though!

name: Bang! Card Game
description: The Sheriff is in town and not everyone likes them. In this game, you will be undercover, either on the sheriff side or the outlaw side. Use cards to target and pick off players in this western spaghetti.

name: Bang! Dice game
description: The Sheriff is in town and not everyone likes them. In this game, you will be undercover, either on the sheriff side or the outlaw side. Roll dice to target and pick off players in this western spaghetti.

name: Battle for Rokugan
description: The land Rokugan is scattered and needs to be united. You and your opponents will battle for the land with hidden armies. Out-bluff and outmaneuver your opponents and control the most land

name: Beast
description: There is a beast roaming in the wild and hunters on the hunt. Play as the team of hunters trying to trackdown and capture the beast. Or play as the solo beast, staying hidden and getting more powerful as you consume livestock.

name: Beyond the Sun
description: The age of stars is here and you will be trying to be the next powerhouse in the system. Play as corporations and research technology in a large tech tree to gather more resources and points.

name: Chess
description: a classic! also visit superhardalgebraproblems.com

name: Chinese Chess
description: a chinese classic! Capture the king!

name: Codenames Pictures
description: Play as 2 teams trying to guess which secret agent belongs to your team. Use a single clever clue for you team to sniff out which picture hides the agents

name: Cosmic Encounter
description: Play as an Alien race trying to expand across the galaxy. Make shift alliances and unexpected combos are always around the corner.

name: Crokinole
description: Classic Canadian game where you flick disks near the center similar to curling

name: Deception: Murder in HK
description: A social deduction game that involves 2 teams: the investigators and the murders.  Each player will have a set of cards for weapons and methods. Find out who is the murder with the help of the forensic scientist and the clues they give.

name: Decrypto
description: Play as a team of message decrypters against another team. Both sides are trying to decrypt their message but also trying to find out what the other team has!

name: Dragoon
description: I dont even remember how to play the game. Play as a dragon going around the land to capture some stuff, fight other dragons, and destroy towns???

name: Dune
description: Play as one of the six factions that is trying to control the planet dune. Each player will have game bending abilities that involves alliances, trading and bluffing. Theres even a card that makes people tell the truth

name: Dune Imperium
description: A game that uses deck-building to add a hidden-information angle to traditional worker placement game. Play as a leader that has an unique ability and build up a deck as the game goes on to adapt to the change in game state and options

name: Dune Imperium Uprising
description: A reimplementation of Dune Imperium that introduces more mechanics as well as streamline old features that is showing some age. The core gameplay remains the same but placed in a entirely different context

name: Fort
description: The playground is now an arms race for who can build their fort biggest and fastest. Play cards to collect resources and upgrade your fort. Along the way, snatch away cards from other players or gain a few extra points for the endgame

name: Jenga
description: Who doesn't like falling wood towers?

name: Monopoly
description: OBJECT...The object of the game is to become the wealthiest player through buying, renting and selling property.EQUIPMENT...The equipment consists of a board, 2 dice, tokens 32 houses and 12 hotels. There are Chance and Community Chestcards, a Title Deed card for each property and play money.PREPARATION...Place the board on a table and put the Chance and Community Chest cards face-down on their allotted spaces on theboard. Each player chooses one token to represent him on his travels around the board.Each player is given $1500 divided as follows: 2 each of $500's, $100's and $50's; 6-$20's; 5 each of $10's, $5's and $1's.All remaining money and other equipment go to the Bank.BANKER...Select as Banker a player who will also make a good Auctioneer. If the Banker plays in the game, he must keep his personalfunds separate from those of the Bank. When more than five persons play, the Banker may elect to act only as Banker and Auctioneer.THE BANK...Besides the Bank's money, the Bank holds the Title Deed cards and houses and hotels prior to purchase and use by theplayers. The Bank pays salaries and bonuses. It sells and auctions properties and hands out their proper Title Deed cards; it sells housesand hotels to the players and loans money when required on mortgages.The Bank collects all taxes, fines, loans and interest, and the price of all properties which it sells and auctions.The Bank never goes broke. If the Bank runs out of money it may issue as much more as may be needed by merely writing on anyordinary paper.
